Package shakkiBotti9000PC

Class Camera

  • java.lang.Object
    • shakkiBotti9000PC.Camera
  • public class Camera
extends java.lang.Object
    Takes pictures and parses the new positions for the pieces from the images.
    Author:
    Heidi Joensuu

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Camera​(Board board)
      The camera constructor creates connection to the webcam change the name of the camera if your camera is not Logitech QuickCam 3000 or if you have multiple of the same cameras connected

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private void analysePicture()
      analyses picture separating "white" pieces from the picture
      private Position[][] createWhiteArray​(Position[][] original)
      creates new list of the positions of white pieces on the board
      void enemyMove()
      Does the changes to the board that were found in the picture
      private Position[][] movePiece​(Position[][] whitePieces, Position[][] newPosition)
      checks the differences of current pieces and old pieces and then creates an array of positions with the updated white piece positions
      void takePicture()
      Takes picture of the board with the webcam

      • movePiece

        private Position[][] movePiece​(Position[][] whitePieces,
                               Position[][] newPosition)
        checks the differences of current pieces and old pieces and then creates an array of positions with the updated white piece positions
        Parameters:
        whitePieces - old positions of white pieces
        newPosition - new positions of generic white pieces
        Returns:
        Position[][] Real pieces from white pieces in the positions of generic pieces from new positions
